attributes.action: Join NAFTA over the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst remaining in the European Economic area like Norway, Britain should attempt to join the NAFTA trading block over the EU.It seems that European interests constantly conflict with those of the British Isles whilst membership to NAFTA would allow Britain to retain some integrity in the international trading arena alongside the USA, Canada and Mexico.
